resources.string: Install Error: Please uninstall the application and redownload the game from Google Play.

"This game requires you to grant the following permissions! Please enable these items:
Storage: Required to install and load critical game resources."

"You will be prompted to grant several permissions. The game requires you to grant all these permissions in order to avoid flashbacks.
Storage: Required to install and load critical game resources."

"In order to run the game, please grant all needed system permissions. Please enter the settings menu of your device to set permissions.
Storage: Storage needed will include the game itself and related resource packs."
